attributes.title: Mistake
attributes.review: So i downloaded this ğ’œğ“Œâ„¯ğ“ˆâ„´ğ“‚â„¯ app to show how much i care about the world, but my phone deleted it from my apps as soon it downloaded. I tried again and again and again and again but whatever I did it just got deleted. I tried one last time through my photos app (donâ€™t ask how I did that) and again it got deleted. I followed this app to my trash, and there it was piled deep and deep in the trash on my phone. With it was every fricking download I had of this app. Not only did it have this app it had millions of millions of pictures of racist, disgusting, stupid, ugly, idiotic, people. Now that I look back, the trash had only pictures of one person that was all of those things combined. Donald Trump. Hmmmmmmmmmm... I wonder why. So I exited out of my trash with satisfaction knowing he is exactly where he should be.
